title: Caribbean beef pies
ingredients: ['Pastry', '375g plain flour', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '225g margarine', '1 egg, beaten', '3 tablespoons water', 'Filling', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '3 spring onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped jalapeno chillies', '450g minced beef', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '350ml water', '60g breadcrumbs']
